Articles.Title: I Tried Google and Samsung's Next-Gen Android XR Headsets and Glasses, and the Killer App Is AI
Articles.Summary: Android XR is available in early form for developers now and will fully launch in 2025. It promises a whole OS for headsets and glass. Samsung's mixed-reality headset and Google's glasses are powered by an all-seeing assistant.

Articles.Title: Here’s what Samsung’s first Android XR headset looks like in person
Articles.Summary: Samsung has its Project Moohan headset on display at Galaxy Unpacked. To me, it looks somewhat similar to Apple’s high-end Vision Pro headset.

Articles.Title: Samsung XR headset display set to go toe-to-toe with Apple Vision Pro
Articles.Summary: The Samsung XR headset will reportedly use a Sony 1.35-inch micro-OLED display. The display is the same hardware that Sony is using in its own flip-up headset, the XR.

Articles.Title: Samsung's Android XR headset could avoid the Apple Vision Pro's biggest mistake, according to this leak
Articles.Summary: Samsung and Google’s XR headset – currently known as Project Moohan – is shaping up to be an Apple Vision Pro competitor. Samsung had already confirmed the headset would b.

Articles.Title: Samsung’s New Android XR Headset Shows Everyone Underestimated the Apple Vision Pro
Articles.Summary: Samsung is working on its own VR/AR helmet dubbed âProject Moohan. The first video to finally show off its capabilities in full seems to cement Samsung and Google’s biggest inspiration for the headset.

Articles.Title: I saw Google’s plan to put Android on your face
Articles.Summary: I felt as close to Tony Stark in a controlled demo as I’ll ever be. I demoed Google’s new Android XR platform, Samsung’S Project Moohan, and prototype smart glasses.

Articles.Title: Samsung’s new XR headset just tipped for a big advantage over the Apple Vision Pro
Articles.Summary: Samsung’s Project Moohan XR headset might have been on show at MWC 2025. Samsung didn’t actually give us any information on what to expect from the device. However a new report from The Elec may have revealed some key details, including the fact Samsung could be using a better screen.

Articles.Title: Unlock the Infinite Possibilities of XR With Galaxy AI
Articles.Summary: eXtended lets you step into any world in an instant. From the bustling streets of New York City to the snowy mountain tops of the Alps.

Articles.Title: Project Moohan: Samsung’s XR headset launches this year
Articles.Summary: Samsung used the Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2025 to showcase its latest AI-powered innovations and expanded mobile experiences. Samsung’s upcoming XR headset will have the capability to run all current Android mobile applications.

Articles.Title: Money Report
Articles.Summary: Project Moohan is Samsung's answer to Apple's $3,500 Vision Pro. Samsung refers to the product as "extended reality" or XR device which aims to merge the digital and physical world.
